name: Imageloader Gene Node Attributes
description: Schema for CM4AI imageloader file image_gene_node_attributes.tsv

name.description: Gene Symbol for the tagged protien

represents.description: Ensembl Gene ID for protien antibody targets, may have multiple matches

ambiguous.description: Indicator variable for whether the protien is identified ambiguously

antibody.description: Antibody Identifier from Human Protien Atlas or negative control

filename.description: The filename of the specified IF image

imageurl.description: URL for specified uniquely specified IF image
